title: Home Sick Baby
alternative_title: ホームシックベイビー
status: ホームシックベイビー
description:
Description :
        Three years ago, Yuusuke revealed to his family his preference of men. But after seeing their reaction, he ran away from home and has lost contact ever since. Now he has become a freeter, not knowing what to do with his life. Whilst shopping, he meets a man who loves riceballs. How will the power of the riceball change Yuusuke? NOTE: This is chapter 4 of the manga Oujisama wa Inai
